sentence.Network_en: You're miles better than most of the performers we see nowadays.
sentence.Network_cn: 你比当下我们见到的大多数表演者都强多了。

sentence.Network_en: People live longer nowadays, and they are better educated.
sentence.Network_cn: 当今，人们越来越长寿，受教育程度也提高了。

sentence.Network_en: The term "early retirement" is nearly always a euphemism for redundancy nowadays.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在“提前退休”几乎就是裁员的委婉说法。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 医学用语_百度文库 ... contain vt. 包含，容纳；装有 nowadays ad. 现今，现在 fiction n. 小说.
医学用语_百度文库 ... contain vt. 包含，容纳；装有 nowadays ad. 现今，现在 fiction n. 小说.
当字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 当街〖 facingthestreet〗 当今〖 nowadays;atpresent;now〗 当紧〖 important〗.
如字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 如胶似漆〖 bedeeplyattachedtoeachother〗 如今〖 nowadays;now〗 如旧〖 asbefore〗.

list.abs: nowadays children and lazier , fat and unsociable , give reason and solution .现在孩子变的越来越懒惰，肥胖和不爱交际，给出原因和解决方法！
In the nowadays world , does not have intermediate zone , only then two - pole ., 在现今世界中 , 不存在中间地带 , 只有两极.
nowadays people tend to associate love with material wealth ., 现在人们往往把爱情与物质财富联系起来.

nowadays people take it for granted that their homes have running water , but only a short time ago almost everyone had to carry water from a well or a stream to their home .如今人们理所当然地认为家里总是有自来水的，然而就在不久前，几乎人人都是从井里或小溪里向家里提水。

entry.def: Nowadays means at the present time, in contrast with the past.

example.ex: Nowadays it's acceptable for women to be ambitious. But it wasn't then...
example.tran: 如今，女性胸怀大志也能被接受，但那时候不是这样。

example.ex: I don't see much of Tony nowadays.
example.tran: 我现在不经常见到托尼了。

means.word_mean: 1. the period of time that is happening now; any continuous stretch of time including the moment of speech;

sentences.sentence: "he lives in the present with no thought of tomorrow"
"it is solely by their language that the upper classes nowadays are distinguished"- Nancy Mitford
"we now rarely see horse-drawn vehicles on city streets"

auth_sentence.content: But he agrees people are buying fewer games nowadays.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he agrees people are buying fewer games nowadays.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he agrees people are buying fewer games nowadays.

auth_sentence.content: There's nothing more irritating than superficial information nowadays.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's nothing more irritating than superficial information nowadays.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's nothing more irritating than superficial information nowadays.

auth_sentence.content: Nowadays we hopefully observe them and leave them alone.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nowadays we hopefully observe them and leave them alone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nowadays we hopefully observe them and leave them alone.

stems_affixes.word_buile: day日,日子+ly表副词或形容词等→daily每日的[地]→日报

stems_affixes.value_cn: 每天的, 日常的, 平常的, 平凡的
stems_affixes.word_buile: every每一的+day日,日子→每天的→日常的→平常的→平凡的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 每日, 日常地, 天天
stems_affixes.word_buile: day日,日子+ly表副词或形容词等→daily每日的[地]→日报
now现在+a+days=day的复数→adv.现今, 现在
day日,日子+ly表副词或形容词等→daily每日的[地]→日报

stems_affixes.value_cn: 天, 白天, 日子, 白昼, 黎明
stems_affixes.word_buile: day日,日子→n.天, 白天, 日子, 白昼, 黎明
day日,日子+break破晓→n.黎明, 拂晓

stems_affixes.value_cn: 日光, 白昼, 白天
stems_affixes.word_buile: day日,日子+light光→n.日光, 白昼, 白天
day日,日子+time时间→n.白天, 日间

Sentence.sentence: What is mentioned in this issue's special report about innovation nowadays?
He hardly needs to do any advertising nowadays.
What does the author say people prefer for their children nowadays?
People nowadays seem to have the sense that their time has become more limited.
More and more Americans feel pressed for time nowadays
What might women do at office meetings nowadays according to the speaker?

sentences.en: Nowadays people like travelling on foot.
sentences.cn: 现在人们喜欢徒步旅行。

sentences.en: He's much thinner nowadays than he used to be;  I think he's been ill.
sentences.cn: 最近他比以前瘦多了, 我想他一直在生病。

sentences.en: Antiques are much sought after nowadays.
Most films are colour ones nowadays.
sentences.cn: 现在大多数影片是彩色的。

sentences.en: The novels of Scott are much in demand nowadays.
sentences.cn: 斯科特的小说目前十分畅销。

sentences.en: We can see many adulterators in the market nowadays.
sentences.cn: 时下我们能见到有许多低劣商品冲击市场。

sentences.en: Many shoes nowadays are made of plastic or similar stuff.
sentences.cn: 如今, 许多鞋子是用塑料或类似的材料制成的。

sentences.en: You can't set up a business nowadays without money behind you.
sentences.cn: 现如今你要是没有钱在后边撑着, 就办不成事。

jushi.english: Antiques are much sought after nowadays.
